Text: Food assignments and directions for Girls WeekendFOOD ASSIGNMENTS Saturday Breakfast Sam Paula Saturday Dinner Kim Phyllis Snacks Judy Lee Sunday Breakfast Lisa Cynthia Paper Products Amy DIRECTIONS FROM LISA Hello Everyone Here are detailed directions to the beach cabin for the Nov girls weekend Directions to the Polk Beach Cabin Go south on IH Take the Harborside Dr exit when you get to Galveston and turn left under the highway this is the first exit after crossing the causeway so be watching for it Travel approx miles on Harborside Dr to Ferry Rd Turn left on Ferry Rd go to the end and catch the ferry to Bolivar this is a free driveon ferry operated by the Texas Hwy Dept After exiting the ferry you will be on Bolivar Peninsula Hwy Travel approximately miles to the Emerald II edition the Crystal Beach water tower is a good land mark when you are getting close and the Emerald II edition is the first road after the post office Turn right into Emerald II there is a small green sign After entering turn left on Flamingo and follow the curve around to Eastview The cabin is on the right about half way down and is located on the corner of Eastview and Crestview The address is Eastview and JS Polk is written on the side The telephone is Im looking forward to seeing everyone lsp

RE help finding kim watson Cc This is what I have for Kim The numbers have worked for me in the past Kim Watson Holcomb Blvd Houston TX home work I talked to Lisa and we are going to meet at her house at PM instead of PM on Friday Do you need directions Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November PM To Subject help finding kim watson Cynthia I have been having trouble finding Kim Do you have her phone numbers and her email address We are putting together the Saturday dinner and I have been out of town so somehow we lost each other last week Any help would be great Thanks Phyllis

RE ParisHi Kim A cooking class sounds like fun Count me in Cynthia Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday January PM To Warner Cynthia A Subject Paris Hi Cynthia I just wanted to let you know that I have been investigating various different activities in Paris and I have found a French cooking school that is willing to put together a private class for us which would include a demonstration of cooking a couple of French dishes and a tasting afterwards The class would be given in English and has a minimum size of girls It would be held on Monday Feb from pm The cost is FF each which is about I am trying to take a head count to see if we have girls that are interested because if we are I need to make our reservation soon Would you please let me know if you are interested in this different activity Thanks Kim
